thread.section_title: Melia Royal Alma - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel - Review of Melia Royal Alma, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Peter D
title: Lovely hotel
text: Stayed here for 3 nights at the end of February with the girlfriend. Really impressed with the hotel. Very central. Walking distance to Eiffel Tower and main shopping area. Hotel was well presented and very clean. We have a small issue with the wifi which was sorted very quickly. Would stay here again for sure. Would highly recommend the melia royal alma.
